analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol:
	Contract HAIMIAN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol#286-287)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol#21) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of HAIMIAN.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol#220) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of HAIMIAN.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/25/0x7958b3ee4f381f3f2f796599a1ab4dbe86375274.sol#220) is not in mixedCase
